titleStmt.title: The second part of No Protestant plot by the same hand.
No Protestant plot. Part 2
titleStmt.author: Ferguson, Robert, d. 1714.
Shaftesbury, Anthony Ashley Cooper, Earl of, 1621-1683.

notesStmt.note: Written by Robert Ferguson. Also attributed to Anthony Ashley Cooper, 1st Earl of Shaftesbury. Cf. Halkett & Laing (2nd ed.).
Reproduction of original in Yale University Library.
